CHARLEY COMMUNITY GUIDELINES

Last Updated: July 14, 2025 | Effective Date: July 14, 2025
OUR COMMITMENT TO SAFETY: CHARLEY is committed to creating a safe, respectful, and inclusive environment for all users. These Community Guidelines outline our expectations for behavior and the consequences for violations. Everyone who uses CHARLEY must follow these guidelines.

Welcome to CHARLEY's Community Guidelines. These guidelines work together with our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to create a safe and positive experience for everyone using our dating, networking, and professional connection platform.

1. CORE PRINCIPLES

1.1 Respect and Dignity

  • Treat everyone with respect: Be kind, considerate, and courteous in all interactions
  • Respect boundaries: Accept "no" as an answer and respect others' comfort levels
  • Embrace diversity: Welcome people of all backgrounds, identities, and perspectives
  • Be authentic: Present yourself honestly and accurately

1.2 Safety First

  • Prioritize safety: Your safety and the safety of others is our top priority
  • Report concerns: Use our reporting tools to flag unsafe behavior or content
  • Trust your instincts: If something feels wrong, it probably is
  • Meet safely: Follow our safety tips when meeting someone in person

1.3 Authentic Connections

  • Be genuine: Build real connections based on honesty and mutual respect
  • Communicate clearly: Express your intentions and expectations openly
  • Respect privacy: Don't share personal information without permission
  • Give constructive feedback: Help create a positive community experience

2. ZERO TOLERANCE VIOLATIONS

The following behaviors result in immediate account termination:

2.1 Sexual Misconduct and Harassment

  • Sexual harassment, assault, or non-consensual sexual contact
  • Sharing or requesting intimate images without consent
  • Sexual exploitation or coercion
  • Inappropriate sexual behavior toward minors (users under 18)
  • Revenge porn or non-consensual sharing of intimate content

2.2 Threats and Violence

  • Threats of violence, self-harm, or harm to others
  • Stalking, doxxing, or intimidation
  • Promoting or inciting violence
  • Terrorist activities or extremist content
  • Weapons sales or violence-related commerce

2.3 Illegal Activities

  • Drug sales or illegal substance transactions
  • Human trafficking or exploitation
  • Fraud, scams, or financial crimes
  • Identity theft or impersonation
  • Money laundering or other financial crimes

2.4 Hate Speech and Discrimination

  • Hate speech based on race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, or disability
  • Promoting discrimination or prejudice
  • Nazi symbolism or white supremacist content
  • Coordinated harassment campaigns
  • Dehumanizing language or imagery

3. SERIOUS VIOLATIONS

These violations may result in immediate suspension or permanent ban:

3.1 Harassment and Bullying

  • Persistent unwanted contact after being asked to stop
  • Bullying, trolling, or targeted harassment
  • Creating fake accounts to harass or deceive others
  • Coordinated harassment by multiple accounts
  • Malicious impersonation of other users

3.2 Inappropriate Content

  • Explicit sexual content or pornography
  • Graphic violence or disturbing imagery
  • Content promoting self-harm or eating disorders
  • Spam, promotional content, or commercial solicitation
  • Misleading or deceptive content

3.3 Privacy Violations

  • Sharing others' private information without consent
  • Screenshot or recording conversations without permission
  • Attempting to circumvent privacy settings
  • Unauthorized access to other users' accounts
  • Collecting user data for external purposes

3.4 Platform Manipulation

  • Creating multiple accounts to deceive others
  • Using bots or automated systems
  • Manipulating matching algorithms
  • Selling or transferring accounts
  • Circumventing safety features or restrictions

4. CONTENT STANDARDS

4.1 Profile Content

Allowed:

  • Recent, accurate photos of yourself
  • Honest descriptions of your interests and goals
  • Professional achievements and career information
  • Appropriate humor and personality expression

Not Allowed:

  • Photos that don't include you or are misleading
  • Explicit, suggestive, or inappropriate images
  • Contact information (phone, email, social media)
  • Promotional content or commercial advertising
  • Images with weapons, drugs, or illegal activities

4.2 Messaging and Communication

Encouraged:

  • Respectful, engaging conversation
  • Sharing appropriate interests and experiences
  • Asking thoughtful questions to get to know someone
  • Being clear about your intentions and boundaries

Not Allowed:

  • Sexual or explicit messages without consent
  • Soliciting money, gifts, or personal information
  • Sharing links to external sites or apps
  • Copying and pasting identical messages to multiple users
  • Continuing to message after being asked to stop

5. ENFORCEMENT ACTIONS

5.1 Warning System

Violation Level First Offense Second Offense Third Offense
Minor (inappropriate content) Warning + Content Removal 24-hour suspension 7-day suspension
Moderate (harassment) 24-hour suspension 7-day suspension 30-day suspension
Serious (repeated violations) 7-day suspension 30-day suspension Permanent ban
Severe (safety threats) Immediate permanent ban

5.2 Additional Enforcement Tools

  • Shadow bans: Limiting visibility without notification
  • Feature restrictions: Limiting access to messaging or matching
  • Profile deactivation: Temporarily hiding profiles from discovery
  • Device bans: Preventing new account creation from specific devices
  • IP blocking: Preventing access from specific networks

6. REPORTING AND SAFETY TOOLS

6.1 How to Report

In-App Reporting:

  • Use the report button on profiles, messages, or content
  • Select the most appropriate violation category
  • Provide detailed information about the incident
  • Include screenshots if relevant (without sharing private info)

Emergency Situations:

  • Contact local law enforcement immediately for immediate threats
  • Report to CHARLEY afterward for account action
  • Use our emergency reporting feature for urgent safety concerns
  • Contact our safety team directly: safety@btechnos.com

6.2 Safety Features

Available Tools:

  • Block and Report: Immediately stop contact and report violations
  • Unmatch: Remove connections you no longer want
  • Privacy Controls: Limit who can contact you and see your profile
  • Verification Badges: Identify verified users for added safety
  • Safe Dating Resources: Tips and guidelines for meeting safely

Automated Safety Systems:

  • AI-powered content moderation for harmful content
  • Automatic detection of suspicious behavior patterns
  • Real-time monitoring of messages for safety concerns
  • Proactive identification of fake or suspicious accounts

7. APPEALS PROCESS

7.1 Account Restrictions

If your account is suspended or restricted:

  • You'll receive an email explaining the reason and duration
  • You can appeal through our appeals process within 30 days
  • Provide additional context or evidence if available
  • Appeals are reviewed by human moderators
  • You'll receive a response within 5-7 business days

7.2 Content Removal

If your content is removed:

  • You'll receive notification about the removal
  • You can appeal if you believe the removal was in error
  • Provide explanation for why the content should be restored
  • Appeals are reviewed within 48 hours

7.3 Permanent Bans

For permanent account termination:

  • Appeals are only considered for potential errors in enforcement
  • New evidence or context may be considered
  • The decision is final after appeal review
  • Creating new accounts after permanent ban is prohibited

8. SPECIAL CONSIDERATIONS

8.1 Age-Appropriate Content

For Users 14-17 (Professional Networking Only):

  • Enhanced privacy protections and content filtering
  • Restricted contact with users over 18
  • Additional safety monitoring and support
  • Parental notification for serious violations

For Users 18+ (All Features):

  • Access to dating features with appropriate safety measures
  • Enhanced verification requirements for dating interactions
  • Comprehensive safety tools and resources
  • Priority support for safety concerns

8.2 Professional Networking Standards

SUITE Professional Features:

  • Maintain professional tone in business communications
  • Accurate representation of skills and experience
  • Respectful networking and mentorship interactions
  • No inappropriate personal advances in professional contexts

9. RESOURCES AND SUPPORT

9.1 Safety Resources

  • Dating Safety Tips: Best practices for safe online and offline interactions
  • Privacy Guide: How to protect your personal information
  • Reporting Guide: Step-by-step instructions for reporting violations
  • Crisis Resources: Links to mental health and crisis support services

9.2 Community Support

  • Help Center: Comprehensive guides and FAQs
  • User Forums: Community-driven support and discussions
  • Safety Workshops: Educational content about online safety
  • Feedback Channels: Ways to suggest improvements and report issues

REMEMBER: These Community Guidelines are designed to keep everyone safe and create positive experiences. By following these guidelines, you're helping build a community where everyone can connect authentically and safely. If you have questions about these guidelines or need help, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.
IMPORTANT: These Community Guidelines are part of our Terms of Service and are legally binding. Violations may result in account restrictions, permanent bans, and potentially legal action. We reserve the right to update these guidelines and will notify users of significant changes.
